heading: HB00061
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE eHEALTH SYSTEM AND SERVICES IN THE DELIVERY OF HEALTH SERVICES WITH THE USE OF INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY IN THE PHILIPPINES, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
short-title: Establishing The Philippine Ehealth System And Services In The Delivery Of Health Services With The Use Of Information And Communications Technology In The Philippines
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-07-23
